welcome_benefits: ₹500 gift voucher on your 1st HPCL fuel transaction above ₹500 and up to 5% cashback (up to ₹1,000 capped) on the transaction value of the first EMI.

Movie & Dining: 25% off on movie tickets up to ₹100 once per month.
Rewards Rate: 30X Reward Points on HPCL Fuel up to 2,400 Reward Points. You can save up to 5% as rewards on grocery and utility expenses, up to 5% as a reward on IDFC FIRST FASTag recharges (max ₹1,000 per month), and 3X rewards on all other retail transactions.
Domestic Lounge Access: 1 Complimentary Domestic Lounge Access Every Quarter (4 Each Year)
Insurance Benefits: The benefit of a personal accident cover of ₹2 lakh and lost card liability cover of ₹25,000.

product_details: Save up to 6.5% on fuel spends with this credit card.
Save up to 5% as a reward on utility and grocery bills (max cap. ₹2,000 per month)
Save up to 5% as rewards on IDFC FIRST FASTag recharge (max cap ₹1,000 per month)
Get 3X rewards on all other miscellaneous retail transactions.
Complimentary domestic airport lounge access per quarter (minimum monthly spending of ₹20,000)
Get up to 25% off on movie tickets (₹100 max cap per month)
